name: Thanksgiving Supermarket Store - Time Managament
description:
Have you ever been to the supermarket with your mom or Dad? Do you love to do shopping at the grocery store? But don’t you want to jump the other side & play as a grocery cashier in your very own supermarket & learn how to operate the cash register. Happy Baby Games brings you Thanksgiving Supermarket Store, a fast paced time management game to test your time management skills all in a speedy way. Thanksgiving Supermarket Store is an educational cash register game for young boys & girls. In Thanksgiving Supermarket Store kids can learn how to handle money as grocery store cashier mania to become the the best supermarket manager in town. Kids can improve their basic math learning skills like addition & subtraction. A supermarket manager knows how to operate the grocery cash register, serving the customers on time, so they don’t get mad on any kind of delays to get their thanksgiving grocery mania.

Thanksgiving Supermarket Store starts with a manual cash register you have to enter the price of each grocery item and get the total of all. Tap on the customer to receive money. Cash drawer will open and you can put the received money and return the balance amount to the customer. You can upgrade your manual cash register, with the automated one so you can scan each thanksgiving grocery list the customer brings to the counter, and ring up the price! Then accept payment via cash, credit card or through mobile NFC, and enter the total amount, followed by scanning the credit card or mobile!

Features:
* Fast paced supermarket Time Management Cash Register Simulation.
* Serve customers & make them happy to get rewards.
* Modern payment methods; Credit Card Machine and NFC Mobile payments.
* Unlock Point Of Sale Machine to scan grocery.
* A fun filled supermarket cash register games.
* Use Auto Complete Robot to get task done automatically.
* Use Cool Candies to increase patience of customers.
* More than 30 Levels to Enjoy.
* Multiple Machines and Purchasing Items.
* Cater your Clients with multifunctional machines.
